entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
